isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - 3300 Model - ELECTRONIC GAUGE CLUSTER - PROGRAMMING

svcproc.title: PROGRAMMING
svcproc.para: When gauge configurations are changed, or the ESC is replaced, the ESC must be programmed with the "ICAP" programming software. The ESC will store the current configuration and update the configuration after changes are made. The new configuration will have to be uploaded to International Truck and Engine. This is accomplished by dialing in and uploading the updated programming. A copy of the programming is stored at International Truck and Engine and updated each time there is a change. This is required in case there is a need to download the programming for ESC replacement. Refer to Programming in the Electrical System Controller section of this manual.

The EGC faults, with electronic gauge cluster version 8.7, the diagnostic trouble code will display SPN field "1705" and with electronic gauge cluster version 9.3 and later, the diagnostic trouble code will display SPN field "2023".
